result.eng: I'll talk to you at lunch time.
result.ga: labhróidh mé leat ag am lóin
result.orig: labhróidh mé leat ag am lóin

result.ponchtml: laḃróiḋ mé leat ag am lóinI'll talk to you at lunch time.

result.eng: Would you like to have lunch with me?

result.orig: ar mhaith leat lón a chaitheamh liom

result.eng: I have my lunch between one and two.

result.eng: What time do you have your lunch?
